summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5675 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Roxbury Street to West Barton Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75086, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
